text:
Whenever the Board of Supervisors shall, by ordinance, enact a zoning reclassification of property pursuant to Charter Section 
4.105 and the Planning Code, the Clerk of the Board of Supervisors shall immediately notify the Assessor of such action in writing. 
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; amended by Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)

heading.catch_text: ZONING RECLASSIFICATION ENACTED BY BOARD OF SUPERVISORS.
